DOC.brief_summary: To compare therapeutic radiographic effect safety etanercept , methotrexate , etanercept/methotrexate combination patient rheumatoid arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Etanercept Plus Methotrexate Either Etanercept Methotrexate Alone Rheumatoid Arthritis .
DOC.detailed_description: Etanercept injection administer skin twice weekly . Methotrexate tablet take weekly . Patients know treatment . Patients need meet study criterion enrol study sign inform consent .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Generally healthy least 18 year age active rheumatoid arthritis . Exclusion : A history presence clinically important medical disease .
